products.title: Burst Pastel Yellow Vertical Blind
products.description: As soft as a yellow can be before it starts drifting into beige territory, this gorgeously chill tone relies on its washed out colour to add a certain flexibility that yellows tend to lack. Perfect for adding a gentle coloured accent to rooms with a more solid colour scheme, it mixes well with browns, blues or greys to soften the tone of the room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Yellow Submarine Vertical Blind
products.description: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the burst yellow submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like yellow submarine youll be singing your way round your home before you know it. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Palate Barley Gold Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.description: Are the arrows facing up or down? Who knows. ? products.description: The triangular pattern that adornes this blind is unique, geometric and a great way to add colour into your home. products.title: Leafy Golden Spring Roller Blind
products.description: The repeating yellow toned leaf print is both delicate and geometric, and in the lighter hue, it is a perfect way of adding a layer of character and pattern to your home, whilst also keeping it subtle and refined in your window. Choose a dimout or blackout fabric for this blind to make it perfect for your room and window setting. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Crown Burgundy Gold Roller Blind

With the uniqe print on the front of this blind, you can add a touch of style and class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Crown burgundy gold roller blind.

products.title: Vassal Gold Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Paper your windows in gold for a touch of midas luxe. The vassal gold pleated perfect fit is a stunning gold-tone fabric made up of delicate checkers, that fold in pleats to add interest down the fabric. This gentle texture is enhanced by the dimout style, which allows for gentle light filtering during the daytime, to bathe the whole room in a sun-enhancing golden glow. Like all blinds in the perfect fit system, the shade clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fitting.
